node.address: Calle 47 85b 36 Barrio Caney - Diagonal Bodytech , Cali, Colombia

content.value:
Whether for business or tourism, our hotel is ready to receive you with the warmest of welcomes.

Our excellent location in the south of the city will situate you very close to large shopping and business centers (Unicentro, Jardín Plaza, La 14 Valle del Lili, Makro, Metro, Holguines Trade Center), the university area (Univalle, Libre, Autónoma de Occidente, Javeriana, Icesi, San Buenaventura, Uniclaretiana), as well as the gastronomic cluster of Ciudad Jardín, gyms, clothing stores, renowned restaurants and more!

Located in Cali, 5 km from Cañaveralejo's Bullring, Hospedaje Caney Cali provides a garden. This guest house offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 6 km from Pan-American Park.
The rooms in the guest house are fitted with a private bathroom, certain units at Hospedaje Caney Cali also provide guests with a balcony. All guest rooms feature a desk.
Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast.
Saint's Peter Cathedral is 8 km from Hospedaje Caney Cali. Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International Airport is 23 km from the property.

description.description: In the Hospedaje Caney Cali we offer our hotel located in the neighborhood El Caney, a pleasant, warm and very quiet environments in which our guests at the end of the day's activities, relax and enjoy their well deserved 'Rest.' Welcome to caney lodging,  A place of rest, where experiences of customs and traditions of our beloved country Colombia and especially of our region of the Cauca Valley are shared, where you and your whole family can feel at home.
